attributes.action: Impose a tax on all financial institutions to recover money given for the crisis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It was estimated last month by the National Audit Office that the UK government bailed out the Uk financial institutions by an "unprecedented" £850 billion.  As this is money us taxpayers can ill afford to lose the PM should make the chancellor impose a tax on all the financial institutions to recover in full this amount.
President Obama has alreadt taken this step in the US.
